title: Question about the MSI Icon Competition
body:
It was saying that each region would be getting RP depending on the ranks for the icon competition. 
I was wondering when the RP would be given out? 
Does anyone know when or if I have anything wrong?
It's in the link. Thank you for the help :D

replies.body:
I'm not entirely sure I understand what you mean.  The article doesn't state that players in the region will be awarded RP.  The region that wins will get a party IP Weekend:

>The performance of teams at MSI will also contribute to the final point total, with the winning fan region receiving a Party IP Weekend. 

Additionally you will also have an opportunity to purchase a special Summoner icon:

>In addition to the reward for the icon competition, we will also be offering an exclusive MSI 2016 gilded regional icon to the region whose team wins the 2016 Mid-Season Invitational. The winning icon will be available globally from May 16 - May 30 for 1 IP in the winning region and 250 RP in all other regions.

Let me know if I seem to be missing anything!

This was a thing?!
I never heard about any competition and I visit leagueoflegends.com almost every day.
